faqs.question: How does the Viseme Creation System work?
faqs.answer:
The viseme creation system generates a complete set of mouth shapes for speech animation:

### Shape Key Requirements
- **Mouth A**: Primary open mouth shape
- **Mouth O**: Rounded mouth shape
- **Mouth CH**: Compressed mouth shape

### Generation Process
The system creates 15 standard visemes through precise shape key mixing:

**Primary Shapes:**
- vrc.v_aa: Uses Mouth A (99.98%)
- vrc.v_ch: Uses Mouth CH (99.96%)
- vrc.v_ou: Uses Mouth O (99.94%)

**Combined Shapes:**
- vrc.v_dd: A(30%) + CH(70%)
- vrc.v_ih: CH(70%) + O(30%)
- vrc.v_ff: A(20%) + CH(40%)
- vrc.v_e: A(50%) + CH(20%)
- vrc.v_kk: A(70%) + CH(40%)
- vrc.v_nn: A(20%) + CH(70%)
- vrc.v_oh: A(20%) + O(80%)
- vrc.v_pp: Subtle A and O mix
- vrc.v_rr: CH(50%) + O(30%)
- vrc.v_sil: Neutral position
- vrc.v_ss: CH(80%)
- vrc.v_th: A(40%) + O(15%)

### Technical Features
- Smart shape key validation
- Automatic deformation checking
- Performance-optimized caching
- Precise weight preservation
- Conflict-free naming system

[info]The system uses carefully calibrated mixing ratios to ensure natural-looking speech animation.[/info]

[note]Shape keys are temporarily renamed during processing to maintain data integrity.[/note]

faqs.question: How does the Viseme Preview System work?
faqs.answer:
The viseme preview system enables real-time testing of all mouth shapes:

### Preview Controls
- Shape Intensity Slider: Fine-tune the strength of each viseme
- Viseme Selection: Quick switching between shapes
- Live Updates: Instant visual feedback

### Preview Features
**Non-destructive Testing:**
- Original shape key values are preserved
- Temporary preview state
- Instant reset capability

**Performance Optimization:**
- Cached shape data
- Efficient value updates
- Memory-conscious design

### Technical Implementation
- Smart cache system for quick switching
- Original value preservation
- Automatic cleanup on exit
- Real-time shape mixing
- Safe state restoration

[warning]While preview mode is active, avoid making other shape key modifications.[/warning]

[info]Use the preview system to verify all viseme shapes before finalizing them.[/info]
